body.name: Wscoficey Fan Controller Temperature Monitor Automatic Speed Control LCD Front Panel STW 5.25" 5 Channel Touchscreen for Computer Cooling Fans
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 1 hr 31 mins
features: [Excellent Touch Screen] Touch screen design, gorgeous layout, allows you to monitor and control the fan more easily.
[Support 5 Channels] Supports up to 5 independent fans, each channel can provide up to 10W of power to drive the most demanding fans available to builders.

[Automatic and Manual Control] Intelligently monitor the computer temperature through the probe, and automatically adjust all fans to the effective mode when entering the automatic mode. The speed of a single fan can be adjusted in manual mode.
[Temperature Monitor] Provides an audible alarm when the temperature is higher than the preset temperature to protect your PC from damage caused by overheating.

[Efficiency Mode] Optimize cooling performance, automatically adjust all fans to the fastest or slowest speed, fan speed display, help you pay close attention to fan speed and provide complete fan control.
body.description: The fan controller is equipped with an advanced touchscreen interface which is compatible with 5.25 inch drive bay. From this touchscreen, you can keep an eye on temperature (in both Celsius and Fahrenheit), RPM...and make adjustments on 5 fans upon auto and manual mode. It offers incredible flexibility and functionality to add to your build's cooling system. It can easily control the fans automatically by probes which can be placed anywhere in the case on any component giving a temperature readout. If you are PC DIY enthusiasts looking for a solution for your cooling system, this touchscreen fan controller is definitely the way to go.Specifications: Model: STW-5036 Compatibility: 5.25" drive bay Fan channel quantity: 5 Output voltage: 5V - 12V Input voltage: 5V - 12V Output power: 10W per channel Fan connector: compatible with 3-pin 4-pin connector Power connector: 4-pin connector Cable length (fan): 5 * 62.5cm / 5 * 24.61in Cable length (power): 23cm / 9.05in Cable length (probe): 62cm / 24.41in Item size: 15 * 8 * 4.2cm / 5.90 * 3.14 * 1.65in (L * W * H) Item weight: 172.1g / 6.07oz Package size: 19.5 * 17 * 6.5cm / 7.67 * 6.69 * 2.56in (L * W * H) Package weight: 287.1g / 10.12ozPackage List: 1 * Fan controller 1 * User manual (English, Chinese) 4 * Mounting screws

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.2 3.2 out of 5 stars 33 ratings 3.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Take control of your fan system!
reviews.reviewText: Works great and better than I thought it would. Good job on this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broken out of box
reviews.reviewText: Screen never pretended to work and I was convinced for a full hour that it was a backlit decal. Great taste but terrible execution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2022
reviews.reviewText: If I can install it then you can too. My only complaint is that there isn’t any PWM

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Typical of these units
reviews.reviewText: How can a superpower capable of deploying globe circling hypersonic missiles be incapable of making a decent fan controller? Instructions were inadequate and incomprehensible. No way to enter a fan curve nor is one already present. Steps the fans up a few hundred RPM when alarm temperature is achieved but not full speed. Of course by then the alarm is beeping which nullifies any benefit. The unit does not appear to employ a feedback loop which is essential for a temperature controlled device. The whole point of an automated controller is to avoid alarm condition not employ it as as a basic function. I will be removing it from my sight. These controllers appear to be all the same with different brands. If you want eye candy, place your order. If you're serious about controlling temps, look elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It works somewhat
reviews.reviewText: It's is a little glitchy. The screen constantly flickers. The functions to adjust fan speeds is not very intuitive, and you do not really gain individual specific fan control. Unless I just received a totally defective component, I would not recommend this item. I would suggest looking for something a little better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This thing didn't work right from the beginning, I couldn't get it to stop flickering, somehow I messed with the controls and turned up the RPMs, when I did that my remote to change light colors would not work so I lowered FAN 1 as low as I could go without flickering and remote worked, FAN 3 doesn't respond to change RPMs at all, FAN 2 must be on 1600 RPMs or whole display will flicker, very dissatisfied...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Do not recommend. Poor quality/workmanship. Power connector fell apart second time I held it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2022
reviews.reviewText: this thing worked great and then with in a two weeks it started to flash and will not stay solid. I would not recommend this to any one as there are better ways to control your fans and see the temp of the computer.
